Patch.name: Event Instructions Upgrade v1.377
Patch.Description: Upgrades InflictStatus(), Allows editing more variables and Adds many instructions to use in events, such as: BlockLoop(), LUI(), SET(), Random(), LoadAddress(), UnitAddress(), WorldUnitAddress(), SaveAddress(), UpdateUnit(), TransformUnit(), RosterHasUnit(), Routine(), PostEvent(), LoadConditionals(), ConditionalDefeat() and many others. Also adds Event Conditional Triggers.
